Impossible to play a legit game of CS with a fresh account. Better off buying a older Higher Trust Factor account to play legit games at all. Too many cheaters in prime and until they can fix that, there are other games worth your time.
me va a 20fps el juego pero todo bien digamo

Ive been playing this game for close to 650 hours and honestly it makes my dad beating me seem relieving. I have broken countless things over this game. It has gotten to the point where suicide might be an option. I have been silver one for years  and finally in my most recent match went to silver two. The experience of hitting silver two was like shooting up heroine and snorting coke at the same time. This game sucks but Im very addicted and havent talked to my family in the past 5 months. I do not recommend this game to anyone.
